title: The Kaepernick Workout and the Teams That Can (and Definitely Can’t) Win the Super Bowl | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
We make sense of Colin Kaepernick’s scheduled workout in Atlanta (0:50) before we get into the teams we feel can win the Super Bowl and the middle-tier teams we are sure will not (8:50). Then, a Take Shop on vetoing trades and 17-game seasons (24:20) before we preview the top three games of the week led by the Texans vs. the Ravens and preview 'Thursday Night Football' (33:20).
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
